KeyVault.IssuingCA: <Name of the issuing certificate in KeyVault.>
KeyVault.MaxCertValidity: <Integer Value. This is the maximum acceptable validity for a certificate>

Csr.Subject: <Subject in the format 'C=US, ST=WA, L=Redmond, O=Contoso, OU=Contoso HR, CN=Contoso Inc'.>
Csr.PathToCsr: <Path to the CSR file in .der format.>
